content: From the functional requirements we have a requirement to search on Flag.category and Flag.code. These parameters are not included in the Flag resource. What is the reason that these search parameters are not in the resource? Would it be useful to open a ticket for adding these parameters?
If you have a use case for it, it's always a good idea to open a ticket, explaining your use case.
Use the 'propose a change' link. Adding category as a search filter is a no-brainer. You might want to provide examples of why you'd search on Flag.code.
